basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus MS9610 (MIC=0.2 µg/ml), Methicillin-resistant S. aureus (MIC=0.2 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus FDA209P (MIC=0.1 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus FDA16 (MIC=0.1 µg/ml), M. luteus IFO3333 (MIC=0.78 µg/ml), M. luteus PCI1001 (MIC=0.2 µg/ml), Bacillus anthracis (MIC=0.1 µg/ml), B. subtilis NRRL B-558 (MIC=0.2 µg/ml), B. subtilis PCI219 (MIC=0.2 µg/ml), B. cereus ATCC 10702 (MIC=0.1 µg/ml).
